Projects

Unused Medicine Donation

I created a platform where unused medicines can be donated to NGOs. These NGOs carefully inspect and distribute the medicines to poor people who otherwise cannot afford them. The platform bridges the gap between surplus medicines and those in need, reducing waste and promoting health equity.
